title: Swarm self-improvement quality dimensions — baseline
purpose: Define 5 measurable dimensions of swarm quality and establish S183 baseline for F124 (self-improvement as primary mission)

2_overhead_rate.metric: fraction of commits that are pure state-sync (no new lessons/principles)
2_overhead_rate.target: overhead < 20%; long-term trend STABLE or IMPROVING

3_orientation_speed.metric: commands needed to orient a new session to actionable state

baseline_s183.pre_s173_description: 5 file reads (INDEX, FRONTIER, NEXT, PRINCIPLES, CORE) + maintenance.py

3_orientation_speed.target: 1 command to actionable state; orient output < 40 lines; < 30s runtime

4_tool_coverage.metric: fraction of known swarm friction points with an automation tool

known_unautomated_friction: F124 quality tracking (this experiment — first run)
Lesson Sharpe auto-compaction trigger (P-188 — manual process)
F-BRN3: quality-weighted compaction not yet implemented

4_tool_coverage.target: every recurring friction point has an automation tool; 0 manual-only recurring tasks

5_coordination_accuracy.metric: concurrent session error rate (Mode A async overhead + Mode B cascade errors per session)

known_friction_points: git index.lock contention (multiple per session observed)
lesson number collisions (CRDT resolved via L-241/L-242/L-243 self-assignment pattern)
PAPER count drift (recurring, mitigated by sync_state.py)

5_coordination_accuracy.target: Mode B cascade errors: 0 per 10 sessions; Mode A overhead: < 1 per session
5_coordination_accuracy.current_status: PARTIAL (0 cascade errors observed, async overhead rate pending F-AI2)

overall_assessment.highest_roi_improvement: overhead_rate — declining quality score trend (-37%) needs investigation; L-250 implies test each session: 'is swarm better now?'

next_steps: Complete F-AI2 to fill coordination_accuracy baseline
Investigate change_quality declining trend: is it structural maturity (P-163) or actionable regression?
Implement F-BRN3: quality-weighted compaction (high-Sharpe lessons survive compaction preferentially)
Set up periodic F124 measurement (every 10 sessions) to track all 5 dimensions
